mapper.sql: SELECT outcomeNo, category, payment, regDate, location, content, historyNo FROM Outcome
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Outcome (category, payment, regDate, location, content, historyNo) VALUES (#{category}, #{payment}, #{regDate}, #{location}, #{content}, #{historyNo});
mapper.select: SELECT ch.*, o.* FROM Member m JOIN Car c ON m.memberno = c.memberno JOIN Carhistory ch ON ch.carindex = c.carindex JOIN Outcome o ON ch.historyno = o.historyno WHERE m.memberno = #{memberno}
SELECT ch.*, o.* FROM Member m JOIN Car c ON m.memberno = c.memberno JOIN Carhistory ch ON ch.carindex = c.carindex JOIN Outcome o ON ch.historyno = o.historyno WHERE ch.carindex = #{carindex};
SELECT o.* FROM Member m JOIN Car c ON m.memberno = c.memberno JOIN Carhistory ch ON ch.carindex = c.carindex JOIN Outcome o ON ch.historyno = o.historyno WHERE ch.historyno = #{historyno};
